name: Gynosphinx
description: The Gynosphinx has the body of a lioness and the head of a woman. It is a powerful and magical being that loves riddles and puzzles.
memorable: Known for its psychic abilities and truesight, capable of rewarding cleverness or punishing failure.
goals: Typically guards ancient temples or knowledge, testing those who seek to pass through its territory.
relations: May serve alongside other sphinxes or magical guardians, acting as protectors of knowledge.
environment: Often found in ancient ruins, temples, or secluded areas rich in history and magic.
strengths: Possesses truesight allowing it to see through illusions, strong spellcasting abilities, and the power to manipulate minds.
weaknesses: Low strength and dexterity may limit physical combat effectiveness.
attacks: Claw attacks that deal slashing and psychic damage, and ranged psychic bolt attacks that can incapacitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Burst, sending out a burst of psychic energy that can incapacitate multiple creatures.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive things as they truly are.
skills: Highly proficient in Arcana, History, and Religion, showcasing its vast knowledge.
additional_information: Immune to psychic damage and effects that sense emotions.
Can initiate a psychic connection to control others' actions.
Uses spells like augury and hallucinatory terrain for manipulation.
spellcasting: 9th-level spellcaster with a spell save DC of 17, capable of casting powerful spells to mislead and control.
test_queries: psychic lioness creature guarding ancient knowledge
large monster with the head of a woman
magic user that can teleport and manipulate minds
guardian of temples with powerful psychic attacks
